newsitem.title: MALAYSIA: POLL-KL BLUE-CHIP SHARE SLIDE SEEN TEMPORARILY OVE.
newsitem.headline: POLL-KL BLUE-CHIP SHARE SLIDE SEEN TEMPORARILY OVE.

text.p: The recent slide in Malaysia's stock market has stopped for now but any rebound will be limited, a Reuters poll of 10 research houses showed on Thursday.
Research houses polled by Reuters said Malaysia's benchmark blue-chip index near term suppport was at an average of 874 points and resistance at 968.
At 0845 GMT the index stood at 917.15, up 8.32 points from the previous close.
